page.title: 03Customs In Chorley (2)
page.content: Chorley Walking Day (2).St.Lawrence's SATURDAY Walking Day is when different Churches get together and walk round Chorley . The route which St.Lawrence's take is from St.Lawrence's school,to Astley Road,to Commercial Road, to Wellington Street and up Union Street to Market Street where they lead the procession through Chorley. They then walk back to the school where a band leads them in hymn singing. SUNDAY The route is from the school down Astley Road along Park Road past St. Lawrence's church and up Queen's Road along Southport Road and down St,Thomas's Road to the Church. At church there is a half-hour service before walking back to the school.
